# reviewer
Improving the track changes and reviewing experience in R markdown

## Important note
In order to use the functionality it is needed to sign-up at [the Hypothe.is website](https://hypothes.is/signup)

## Installation

You can install the released version of reviewer from [GitHub](https://github.com/ropenscilabs/reviewer) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("ropenscilabs/reviewer")
```
